## Hypothesis
State the claim and whether it is exploratory or confirmatory.

## Motivation
Why this matters for HODLXXI.

## Proposed method
Formal model, simulation, data plan, or mixed method.

## Acceptance criteria
What outcomes would support or falsify the hypothesis?

## References
List key citations.
